weekly_top_story.headline: Tsunami Advisory Issued for Iwate After 6.7 Magnitude Pacific Quake
weekly_top_story.summary: A powerful 6.7 magnitude earthquake struck the Pacific Ocean near Japan, triggering a tsunami advisory for Iwate and causing power cuts and transportation disruptions, highlighting ongoing seismic risks in the region.

stories.headline: China Halts Export Ban on Dual-Use Gallium, Germanium, and Graphite to U.S.
stories.summary: China has suspended its export ban on critical materials like gallium, germanium, and graphite to the United States until November 2026, easing tensions in the global supply chain for high-tech and green energy industries.

stories.headline: 5.4 Magnitude Earthquake Recorded in Andaman Sea
stories.summary: A moderate 5.4 magnitude earthquake was recorded in the Andaman Sea, prompting monitoring by regional seismology centers and reminding coastal communities of ongoing tectonic activity in the Indian Ocean.
